sot: re kgethile letsatsi lena e le la ho bitsa palamente ya kopanelo ho etsa puo e mabapi le maemo a setjhaba, ho keteka motsotso ona wa bohlokwa o fetotseng naha ya rona.
ssw: sikhetse lolusuku njengelusuku lekubita lomhlangano weliphalamende loyinhlanganisela kute setfule inkhulumo yesive, ngenhloso yekubungata sehlukanisamanti lasagucula live letfu.

sot: ho lokollwa ha madiba ho tlisitswe ke boitseko bo matla ba batho ba aforika borwa.

sot: batshwaruwa ba dipolotiki ba mehleng le mekaubere e teng kwano e bile dipaki tsa seo hobane e ne le karolo ya taba eo.
ssw: tiboshwa tetembusave tangembili kanye netigagayi tetemphi letikanye natsi lamuhla takufakazela loko ngobe tatiyincenye yaloko lokwenteka.

sot: le tla hopola e le ka nnete hore boholo ba batho naheng ena, ka mekgahlelo e fapaneng, bo ile ba arabela ka maikemisetso kgoeletso ya ho hlokisa naha botsitso le ho etsa bonnete ba hore kgethollo ha e sebetse.
ssw: nitawukhumbula kutsi linyenti lebantfu bakulelive, ngekwehlukana kwabo, basabela ngekutimisela elubitweni lwekwenta lelive libe ngulelingabuseki nalekungasebenteki kahle kulo ngenca yelubandlululo.

sot: re keteka letsatsi lena le batshwaruwa ba mehleng ba dipolotiki bao re ba memmeng ka ho ikgetha hore ba be le rona.
ssw: sibungata lolusuku netiboshwa tangembili tetembusave lesitimeme ngalokulikhetselo kutsi tihlanganyele natsi.

sot: re amohela ka ho ikgetha ba tswang mose hore ba be le rona mona, helene pastoors, michael dingake wa botswana, monghadi andimba toivo ya toivo wa swapo ya namibia.
ssw: semukela labo labavela emaveni langesheya, helene pastoors, michael dingake balebotswana, mnu andimba toivo ya toivo weswapo enamibia.

sot: re thabetse hore ditho tsa moifo wa molao wa nyewe ya bohlabaphio ya rivonia di be le rona.
ssw: siyajabula kuhanjelwa ngemalunga elitsimba letemtsetfo elicaleni lekuvukela umbuso laserivonia ?

sot: lord joel joffe, ya seng a ahile london le moahlodi arthur chaskalson.
ssw: lord joel joffe, nyalo losahlala elondon najaji arthur chaskalson.

sot: hape re hopola le ho lebisa hlompho ho mongahadi harry schwarz, ya hlokahetseng beke e fetileng.
ssw: sikhumbula siphindze sihloniphe mnu harry schwarz, losishiye ngekudzabuka lokukhulu elivikini lelengcile.

sot: hara ditho kaofela, e ne e le setho sa moifo wa tshireletso wa nyewe ya rivonia.
ssw: phakatsi kwalokunye, bekalilunga lelitsimba lebammeli ecaleni laserivonia.

sot: re isa diteboho ho metswalle le bomphato ba matjhabeng, bakeng sa ho thusa ntweng ya rona ya ho fihlella tokoloho.

sot: re isa kamohelo e ikgethang ho lelapa la ha mandela.
ssw: semukela ngalokulikhetselo umndeni wakamandela.

sot: lelapa lena e bile letshwao la ho intsha sehlabelo ho bohle ba utlwileng bohloko ka kgethollo.
ssw: babe luphawu lwekutinikela lwalabanyenti labatfole bumatima ngenca yelubandlululo.

sot: re isa madume ho boetapele ba mokga o busang le bomphato ba bona, bao ho bona morero ono e leng wa bohlokwa ka tsela e ikgethang.
ssw: sibingelela buholi belicembu lelibusako kanye nabelidlelandzawonye, lokungumcimbi wabo welikhetselo lona.

sot: baheso le metswalle,letsatsing lena le ikgethang, re boetse re lokela ho ananela nyehelo ya boetapele ba national party, bao qetellong ba ileng ba lemoha hore kgethollo ha e na bokamoso.
ssw: bakitsi nebangani,ngalolusuku lwelikhetselo, kumele sikhumbule ligalelo lebuholi be-national party, labagcine babonile kutsi lubandlululo alusanandzawo.

sot: ntumelleng hore ke hlahise karolo e bapetsweng ke mopresidente wa mehleng pw botha.
ssw: ngivumeleni ngisho indzima leyadlalwa ngumengameli wangembili pw botha.

sot: ke yena ya qadileng dipuisano ka kgonahalo ya ho lokolla batshwaruwa ba dipolotiki.
ssw: nguye lowacalisa tinkhulumiswano letimayelana nekukhululwa kwetiboshwa tetembusave.

sot: mopresidente botha o sebeditse le letona la mehleng la toka, monghadi kobie coetzee, ya neng a thuswa ke ngaka neil barnard le mr mike louw.
ssw: mengameli botha wasebentisana nendvuna yetebulungiswa yangembili, mnu kobie coetzee, naye lowasitwa ngudkt.

sot: ba bapetse karolo ya bohlokwa tseleng e neng e isa tokolohong ya madiba.
ssw: badlala indzima lebalulekile eluhlelweni lolwaholela ekukhululweni kwamadiba.

sot: baheso ba hlomphehileng,aforika borwa e sa ntse e tla ananela ka botlalo, karolo ya bohlokwa e bapetsweng ke moporesidente wa mehleng wa anc, wa mphato oliver tambo, ya entseng motheo wa hore naha ena e be mohlala o motle wa tokoloho le demokerasi.
ssw: bakitsi labahloniphekile,iningizimu afrika kusalindzeleke ivume ngalokuphelele, indzima lebalulekile leyadlalwa ngumengameli wangembili we-anc, licabane oliver tambo, lowabeka sisekelo salelive kutsi libe sibonelo lesigcamile senkhululeko nentsandvo yelinyenti.

sot: ke boetapele ba hae bo hlwahlwa, tjhebelopele le pono e hlakileng tse entseng hore anc e matlafatse tsela ya ditumellano tsa ditherisano.
ssw: bekubuholi bakhe lobuvelele, kubonela tintfo embili kanye nekucacisa kahle umbono lokwaholela ekutsaneni i-anc icinise silandzelelo sayo sekusombulula tintfo ngekukhulumisana.

sot: bohlale ba hae bo bonahetse tumellanong ya harare, eo a e ngotseng le ho e etella pele.
ssw: buhlakani bakhe baphindze babonakala esivumelwaneni saseharare, lokunguye lowasibhala waphindze wasichuba.

sot: sena ke sona se entseng motheo bakeng sa phatlalatso e entseng histori ya mopresidente fw de klerk, dilemong tse 20 tse fetileng.
ssw: nguloku lokwabeka sisekelo setimemetelo letingumlandvo tamengameli fw de klerk, eminyakeni lengema-20 leyengca.

sot: ka sena, mopresidente de klerk o bontshitse sebete le boetapele bo hlwahlwa.
ssw: kuloku, mengameli de klerk wakhombisa sibindzi lesimangalisako kanye nebuholi lobucinile.

sot: letsatsing lena le le holo, e re ke boele ke ananele karolo e bapetsweng ke mofu mofumahadi helen suzman.
ssw: ngalolusuku lolukhulu kangaka, asengiphindze ngibonge indzima leyadlalwa ngulongasekho nkt.

sot: ke ka nako e telele, e le lentswe la hae feela palamenteng, le neng le lwanela diphethoho.
ssw: sikhatsi lesidze, bekanelivi lemuntfu munye ephalamende, afuna kube khona ingucuko.

sot: re boela re ananela karolo ya moetapele wa inkatha freedom party, morena mangosuthu buthelezi, eo le yena a lwanetseng ho lokollwa ha madiba, le tokoloho ya batshwaruwa ba bang ba dipolotiki le ho kgutla ha babalehi ba dipolotiki.
ssw: siphindze sibonge indzima leyadlalwa ngumholi we-inkatha freedom party, inkhosi mangosuthu buthelezi, naye lobekafuna kukhululwe madiba, kanye naletinye tiboshwa tetembusave nekubuya kwalabasekudzingisweni.

sot: re sa boela re phetha ho leboha ho tloha botebong ba dipelo tsa rona ba dinaha tsa matjhabeng bakeng sa tshehetso ya bona e sa thekeseleng ntweng ya rona.
ssw: sendlulisa kubonga kwetfu kummango wemave emhlaba ngekwesekela umzabalazo wetfu ngendlela lengenakunyakatiswa.

sot: dinako tsena tsa histori ya rona di bontsha bokgoni ba rona ba ho ipopa, le ka tlasa mathata a maholo, le ho beha ditabatabelo tsa naha ka pele ho ditabatabelo tse ding tsohle.
ssw: letikhatsi emlandvweni wetfu tikhombisa likhono letfu lekuhlangana, ngisho nangaphansi kwetimo letimatima, kanye nekubeka tifiso telive ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,selemong sena se hodimo, re tla tshwaya dilemo tse lekgolo tsa ho thehwa ha kopano ya aforika borwa, e thehilweng ka 1910. sena se ile sa tswala mmuso o kopaneng.
ssw: ngekusebentisana singenta lokunyenti,malunga lahloniphekile,kulomnyaka, sitawube sicedza iminyaka lelikhulu kwasungulwa inhlangano yeleningizimu afrika, leyasungulwa nga-1910.

sot: sa bohlokwa ke hore, ho qhelelwa ka thoko ha batho ba batsho.
ssw: loku kwasungula umbuso lohlangene.

sot: kopanong ena e bile le leng la mabaka a maholo a hore mokgatlo wa african national congress o thehwe ka 1912. ha re tla be re tshwaya dilemo tsena tse lekgolo selemong sena, re lokela ho thuhisa le ho hopola tsela eo re e tsamaileng jwaleka naha.
ssw: kakhulu, kukhishwa kwalabamnyama kulenhlangano bekusizatfu lesikhulu sekusungulwa kwe-african national congress nga-1912.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,"re hopola mantswe a madiba ha a ne a lokollwa, ha a ne are mme ke a qotsa:ke eme ka pele ho lona, e seng jwaloka moporofeta empa jwaloka mosebeletsi ya ikokobeditseng wa lona, setjhaba.
ssw: njengobe sitawube sicedza iminyaka lelikhulu ngasekupheleni kwalomnyaka, kumele sibuke kutsi sesihambe kanganani njengelive.

sot: boikitlaetso ba lona bo se nang ho lekanngwa ke bona bo entseng hore ke be mona kajeno.
ssw: kutinikela kwenu nalokunebuchawe ngiko lokwente kutsi ngikwati kuma embi kwenu lamuhla.

sot: ha ho le jwalo, ke beha dilemo tse setseng tsa ho phela ha ka matsohong a lona.
ssw: ngaloko ngibeka iminyaka lesele yekuphila kwami etandleni tenu.

sot: "mantswe ana a re kgothatsa hore re se ke ra phomola ho fihlela re fihlella ditabatabelo tsa ho ba setjhaba se lokolohileng bofumeng le bohloking.
ssw: "lamagama asikhutsata kutsi singaphumuli sidzimate sifinyelele embonweni wemmango longenabuphuya nalongasweli.

sot: dilemong tse mashome a mabedi e sa le madiba a lokollwa, naha ya rona e fetohile haholo.
ssw: kuleminyakalishumi lemibili kwakhululwa madiba, live letfu seligucuke kakhulu.

sot: opresidente mandela o kopantse naha ena ka sepheo sa ho re e hloke kgethollo ka bong, ka botjhaba, mme e be naha ya demokerasi le aforika borwa e tswetseng pele.
ssw: mengameli mandela wahlanganisa lelive ngaphansi kwembono weningizimu afrika lengacwasi ngekwebulili, lengacwasi ngekwebuhlanga, yentsandvo yelinyenti nalenemphumelelo.

sot: kajeno ha re keteka tokoloho ya madiba, ha re itlameng hore re tla aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa maafrika borwa oohle, ba batsho le ba basweu.
ssw: njengobe sibungata kukhululwa kwamadiba lamuhla, asesitibophetele ekwakheni likusasa lelincono lato tonkhe takhamiti taseningizimu afrika, letimnyama naletimhlophe.

sot: ha re latelleng toro ena ya madiba ya e lwanetseng bophelo ba hae bohle, toro ya setjhaba sa demokerasi se lokolohileng , moo batho ba phelang mmoho ka kutlwano le menyetla e lekanang.
ssw: asesichubele embili lombono madiba lawulwela imphilo yakhe yonkhe ?

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,re bitsitse kopanelo ena ya palamente bosiu hore bongata ba batho ka naheng, basebetsi le bana ba dikolo, e be karolo ya morero ona.
ssw: umbono wemmango wentsandvo yelinyenti nalokhululekile, lapho bonkhe bantfu bahlala ndzawonye ngekuthula futsi banematfuba lalinganako.

sot: re kgahlisitswe ke morolo o bontshitsweng ke batjha ka morero ona.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sibite umhlangano loyinhlanganisela ebusuku kute labanyenti eliveni letfu, basebenti, bantfwana besikolo, batewuba yincenye yalomhlangano.

sot: bana ba 206 ba tswang diprovenseng tsohle ba bile teng dingangisanong tsa mantlha tse etellang pele puo e mabapi le maemo a setjhaba bakeng sa karolo eo batjha ba ka e bapalang twantshong ya bofuma.
ssw: sitsatsekile ngemdlandla welusha mayelana nalomhlangano.

sot: ngwahola, re bile le maemo a mabe a moruo lekgetlo la pele dilemong tse 17. maemo ana a mabe a moruo a entse hore re lahlehelwe ke mesebetsi e 900 000. boholo ba bao ba lahlehetsweng ke mesebetsi e ne e le bona ba jereng malapa a futsanehileng.
ssw: bantfwana labangemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasitfupha nesitfupha labavela kuto tonkhe tifundza babambe lichaza kunkhulumomphikiswano leyandvulela inkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive mayelana nendzima yelusha ekulweni nebuphuya.

sot: selemong se fetileng ka hlakola, mmuso, dikgwebo, baemedi ba basebetsi le baahi ba ile ba dumellana ka sehlopha sa mekgwa ya ho fokotsa sekgahla sa maemo ana a mabe a moruo.
ssw: sihalalisela lobahlule bonkhe, charlotte le fleur wesikole lesiphakeme saseworcester, kanye nabo bonkhe lababambe lichaza kulomsebenti lomatima.

sot: re kentshe tshebetsong mekgwa e matla kgahlanong le maemo a mabe a moruo jwaloka mmuso ka ho kgina metheo ya setjhaba.
ssw: bakitsi nebangani,sihlangana ngemuva kwetiyaluyalu tetemnotfo emhlabeni wonkhe.

sot: bakeng sa ho bebofatsa mathata a bafutsanehileng, re potlakisitse ho nyollwa ha ditjhelete tsa letlole la thuso la tshehetso ya bana, mme ra eketsa dilemo tsa bana ba lokelang ho fumana tshehetso ya tjhelete ya thuso ka ho kenyeletsa le bana ba dilemo tse ka hodimo ho tse 14. dilemong tse tharo tse tlang, bana ba tlatsetso ba dimilione tse pedi ba tswang malapeng le matlong a futsanehileng, ba dilemo tse 15 ho ya ho 18, ba tla una molemo letloleng la thuso ya tshehetso ya bana.
ssw: lenkinga iholele ekutseni umnotfo wetfu ulahlekelwe imisebenti lengu-900 000. linyenti lalabalahlekelwe yimisebenti yabo ngilabo labondla imindeni lephuyile.

sot: koporasi ya ntshetsopele ya diindaseteri e beheletse ka thoko dibilione tse tsheletseng tsa diranta ho thusa dikhamphani tse tlokotsing.
ssw: ngendlovana kulomnyaka lowengcile, hulumende, emabhizimisi, tisebenti nalabamele ummango bavumelana ngetindlela letihlanganisile tekunciphisa umtselela waletiyaluyalu tetemnotfo.

sot: mekutu ena e ile ya phahamiswa ke lenaneo la mesebetsi ya setjhaba la rona.
ssw: silandzele tincumo leticinile tekulwa nekufadalala kwemnotfo ngekucondzisa emalini lechitfwa nguhulumende, kakhulukati kusakhiwonchanti.

sot: setjhaba se tla hopola hore puong ya maemo a setjhaba ka 2009, ke ile ka tsebisa hore lenaneo le ekeditsweng la mesebetsi le tla hlahisa menyetla ya mesebetsi e 500 000 ka tshitwe 2009. ena ke menyetla ya mesebetsi e hlahisitsweng ho fana ka menyetla ya mosebetsi ho batho ba sa sebetseng hore ba be le lekeno la tjhelete,le hore ba thole boiphihlelo le menyetla ya thupello.
ssw: kucinisekisa kuphepha kwalabaphuyile, sichubekisele embili kwandziswa kwemali yetibonelelo, saphindze selula iminyaka yeluhlelo lwesondlo sebantfwana yayewufika eminyakeni yebudzala lengu-14.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng, maaforika borwa a heso,re thabela ho tsebisa hore mafelong tshitwe, re hlahisitse menyetla ya mesebetsi e 480 000 ya mesebetsi ya setjhaba, seo e leng 97% ya seo re neng re se rerile.
ssw: kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako, labanye bantfwana labatigidzi letimbili labavela emindenini lephuyile, labaneminyaka lengu-15 kuya ku-18, batawuhlomula kuloluhlelo lwesondlo sebantfwana.

sot: mesebetsi ena e dikarolong tse kang tsa ho aha, tlhokomelong tsa malapa le tsa baahi, le diporojekeng tsa tikoloho.
ssw: inhlangano yekutfutfukiswa kwetimboni ibekele eceleni imali lengemarandi langemabhiliyoni lasitfupha kute kusitwe tinkampani lesetidvonsa matima.

sot: re hlwaile dibaka tse itseng tsa ntlafatso, tseo re tla sebetsanang le tsona ho ya pele ho kenyeletsa le diporojeke tse batlang basebetsi ba bangata.
ssw: lolutawuniketa tisebenti litfuba lekukhetsa kuceceshwa endzaweni yekudzilitwa emsebentini.

sot: re lebohela moya o motle wa lelapa, boahi le mosebetsi wa boithaopi o bontshitsweng ke batho ba ba ngata bakeng sa ho thusa bao ba anngweng ke tlokotsi ena, hara dinako tsena tse boima.
ssw: lemisebenti isemikhakheni yekwakha, kunakekela bantfu emakhaya nasemmangweni, kanye nemiklamo yetemvelo.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,matshwao a ikonomi a bontsha hore re batla re bona ntlafalo ya maemo.
ssw: sibone letinye tindzawo lesingenta ncono kuto, letitawukhomba kuchubekela embili, kufaka ekhatsi kucinisekisa imiklamo lebukene netisebenti.

sot: maemo a ikonomi a a ntlafala aforika borwa, mme re lebeletse kgolo ya moruo ho ya pele.
ssw: siyati kutsi leti naletinye tindlela tanciphisa ngalokuphelele imitselela yekufadalala kwemnotfo.

sot: dipalopalo tsa basebetsi tse lokollotsweng ka labobedi, di bontsha hore ha jwale ikonomi e hlahisa mesebebetsi ho fapana le ho e fokotsa.
ssw: siyabonga ngemoya wekusebenta kwemndeni, kwemmango nekutitsandzela lokhutsata bantfu labanyenti kutsi basite labo labakhungetfwe nguletiyaluyalu tetemnotfo, ngaletikhatsi letimatima.

sot: le ha ho le jwalo, e sa le kapele haholo hore re ka netefatsa sekgahla seo ikonomi e nyolohang ka sona.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,tinkhomba tetemnotfo tikhomba kutsi sesigucule simo nyalo.

sot: jwale ke nako ya ho etsa motheo bakeng sa kgolo e matla ho ya pele, le kgolo e tla tswala mesebetsi e mengata.
ssw: umnyakato wetemnotfo uyenyuka eningizimu afrika, kantsi silindzele kukhula lokuya embili.

sot: lenaneo la rona la nako e telele la motheo wa setjhaba le tla re thusa ho hola ka potlako.
ssw: tibalo tetisebenti letikhishwe ngelesibili, tikhombisa kutsi nyalo umnotfo sewusungule ematfuba emisebenti kunekutsi ilahleke.

sot: thuto ya rona le mananeo a bokgoni di tla phahamisa tlhahiso le hlodisano.
ssw: nyalo sesikhatsi sekubeka sisekelo sekukhula lokucinile lokuya embili, kanye nekukhula lokuletsa imisebenti leminyenti.

sot: leano la rona la tshebetso ya indaseteri le ho tsepamisa maikutlo ho mesebetsi e bolokehileng ya temo bakeng sa tikoloho, di tla aha dindaseteri tse ngata le tse matla bakeng sa ho hohela basebetsi.
ssw: tinhlelo tesakhiwonchanti setfu sesikhatsi lesidze titasisita kutsi sikhule ngekunonopha.

sot: lenaneo la rona la ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahae le tla ntlafatsa tlhahiso ya mahaeng, le maphelo a baahi ba metseng ya mahae.
ssw: tinhlelo tetfu tetemfundvo netemakhono titakwandzisa kukhicita kanye nekuncintsisana kwetfu.

sot: seo e leng sa bohlokwa mawaleng a rona a ho hodisa le ho tsoseletsa moruo, ke lenaneo la rona la ho tsetela meahong.
ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwenchubomgomo lesebenta kutetimboni nekugcila kwetfu lokusha emisebentini lephelele, kutakwakha timboni leticinile naletemukela tisebenti letinyenti.

sot: dilemong tse tharo tse tlang, mmuso o tla sebedisa dibilione tse r846 hodima metheo ya setjhaba.
ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya titakwenta ngcono umkhicito wasemakhaya, kanye netemphilo tebantfu labahlala etindzaweni tasemakhaya.

sot: bakeng sa dipalangwang, re tla boloka mebila ya rona maemong a matle le ho atolosa marangrang a ditsela tsa rona.
ssw: lokwesekela lisu letfu lekubuyisela umnotfo esimeni lesetayelekile nasekukhuliseni, luhlelo lwetfu lwekusisa ngetimali.

sot: re tla netefatsa hore marangrang a rona a seporo sa terene ke a tshepahalang, a maemong a hlodisano mme a hokahantswe betere le maemakepe a rona.
ssw: kutekutfutsa, sitawugcina siphindze senabise umsebenti wetfu wekuchumanisa tindzawo ngemigwaco.

sot: ho netefatsa phano e tshepahalang ya motlakase, re theile komite ya kahare ya matona e shebaneng le matla a motlakase ho hlabolla leano la dilemo tse a 20 la mehlodi e kopanetsweng.
ssw: sitawucinisekisa kutsi kuchumanisa kwetfu kwetindzawo ngaloliwe kuyetsembeka, futsi kuhlanganiswe kancono nemachweba etfu.

sot: hara tse ding, sena se tla shebana ho nka karolo ha bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba matla a motlakase, le ho tshireletsa bafutsana kgahlanong le ditjeo tse phahameng tsa motlakase.
ssw: kute kucinisekiswe kuniketwa kwemandla agezi, sisungule likomiti letindvuna lelibukene netemandla, kute kwentiwe luhlelo loluhlanganisile lweminyaka lengama-20.

sot: re tla theha mohlahisi ya ikemetseng, ya se nang kopano le eskom holdings.
ssw: phakatsi kwaletinye tintfo, loku kutawubuka ekutibandzakanyeni kwebakhiciti bemandla labatimele, nasekuvikeleni labaphuyile ekwenyukeni kwemanani agezi.

sot: eskom e tla tswelapele ho aha keketseho ya ho fehla motlakase le ho ntlafatsa paballo ya diteishene tsa motlakase.
ssw: sitawusungula luhlelo lwekusebenta ngagezi lolutimele, lolwehlukile ku-eskom holdings.

sot: se potlakileng haholo ke hore ho tsepamiswe maikutlo ho fetoleng leano ka ho kena ka setotswana ho hlahiseng mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha.
ssw: eskom utawuchubeka nekwakha lamanye emandla ekukhicita emandla agezi aphindze ente ncono simo setiteshi takhe tagezi.

sot: sekgahla sa ho hloka mosebetsi batjheng ba rona se hodimo haholo ho palohare.
ssw: kucinisekisa kukhuliswa kwemnotfo lohlanganisako, kute sisite kukhula nentfutfuko, sisungule umkhandlu loweluleka ngeluhlelo lolwenabile lwekuniketa labamnyama emandla kutemnotfo, loluholwa ngumengameli.

sot: ditshisinyo di tla behwa tafoleng bakeng sa ho tshehetsa ka ditjhelete ditjeo tsa ho hira basebetsi ba batjha dilemong, bakeng sa ho kgothaletsa difeme ho hira batho ba se nang boiphihlelo.
ssw: kugcila kwetfu lokukhulu ekuguculeni inchubomgomo kumele kube kungenela ekusunguleni imisebenti yebantfu labasha.

sot: ho na le mananeo a mang a katoloso ya ho hirwa ha setjhaba a leng tseleng.
ssw: emazinga ekungasebenti kwebantfu labasha angetulu kakhulu kunelizinga lelilingene.

sot: sena se kenyeletsa motheo wa tsa lehae le diporojeke tsa thuto e phahameng le diporejeke tsa ho ithuta ho bala, tlhokomelo ya lapeng, paballo ya dikolo le merero ya ntshetsopele ya bana.
ssw: tiphakamiso titawubekwa kute kusitwe ngetimali etindlekweni tekucasha tisebenti talabasha, kute kukhutsatwe emafemu kutsi atsatse tisebenti letite lwati lwemsebenti lolwenele.

sot: re laetse lekala lena ho sebetsa ka potlako bakeng sa ho theha makala a lona, naheng ka bophara, hore le re thuse ho sebetsana le ho phethahatsa mananeo a ntshetsopele ya batjha ka hara mmuso.
ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi sakhiwonchanti ezingeni lasekhaya nemiklamo lemikhulu kanye nemiklamo yekukwati kufundza nekubhala, kunakekela kwasemakhaya, kugcinwa kwetikolo kanye nemitamo yekukhulisa bantfwana labasebancane.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,ha mmuso ona o ne o kena kantorong selemong se fetileng, re itlamme ho menahanya boikitlaetso ba rona ba ho aha mmuso o matla o tswelang pele.
ssw: kulomnyaka lowengcile sisukumise sikhungo sekutfutfukisa lusha lwavelonkhe.

sot: re itse e tla ba mmuso o arabelang ditlhoko le ditakatso tsa batho, le o sebetsang betere le ka potlako.
ssw: siyalele loluphiko kutsi lusungule imitimba yalo, eliveni lonkhe, kute lutewukwati kusita ekucondziseni tinhlelo tekutfutfukisa ngekhatsi kuhulumende.

sot: seo e tla ba sesupo se hlalosang tsamaiso ena e tla ba hore e tseba moo batho ba dulang, e utlwisisa ditlhoko mme e arabela ka potlako.
ssw: sitsite kutakuba ngumbuso lophendvula etidzingweni nasetifisweni tebantfu, nalosebenta kancono nangekunonopha.

sot: re aha mmuso o tsepamisitseng maikutlo tshebetsong, ka ho ntlafatsa meralo le ho beha tshebetso leihlo le ho e hlahloba.
ssw: luphawu loluchaza lokuphatsa kutakuba ngulolo lwekutsi kuyati lapho bantfu bahlala khona, kuvisisa tidzingo tabo futsi kuphendvula ngekunonopha.

sot: re boetse re lokela ho hokahanya mekgwa ya tekatekano ya bong ho lenaneo la mmuso la tshebetso.
ssw: hulumende kumele asebente ngekunonopha, ngemandla nangekuhlakanipha.

sot: mohato ona wa tshebetso o tla netefatsa hore basadi, bana le batho ba nang le boqhwala ba kgona ho fihlella menyetla ya ntshetsopele.
ssw: sitawulindzela sigungu lesiphetse kanye nemsebenti wahulumende kutsi bahambisane nalombono.

sot: re thabela ho phatlalatsa tsela e ntjha ya ho etsa dintho mmusong.
ssw: sakha umbuso logcile ekusebenteni, ngekwenta ncono kuhlela kanye netinhlelo tekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.

sot: mosebetsi wa mafapha o tla methwa ka diphetho, o tla ntshetswa pele ke tsela ya rona ya ho beha leihlo tlhatlhobo.
ssw: kumele futsi sihlanganise tindlela tekulinganisa kutebulili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekwenta.

sot: jwaloka ha le hlokomela, re itlamme ka dintlha tse hlano tse ka sehlohlolong: thuto, bophelo bo botle, ntshetsopele ya metse ya mahae le ntjhafatso ya naha, tlhahiso ya mesebetsi e itseng tjha, le twantsho ya botlokotsebe.
ssw: loluhlelo lwekwenta lutawucinisekisa kutsi bomake, bantfwana nebantfu labakhubatekile bakwati kufinyelela kumatfuba ekutitfutfukisa.

sot: ho tlatseletsa, re tla sebetsa ka matla ho ntlafatsa tshebetso e tswileng matsoho ya mmuso wa lehae, ntshetsopele ya metheo ya setjhaba le bodulo ba batho.
ssw: sinentfokoto yekumemetela indlela lensha yekwenta tintfo kuhulumende.

sot: re tla itlama ka ho etsa diketso tse mmalwa tsa bohlokwa hore re fihlelle diphetho tsena.
ssw: umsebenti wematiko utawukalwa ngemiphumela, letfutfukiswe ngeluhlelo lwetfu lwekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.

sot: re beile thuto le ntshetsopele ya bokgoni bohareng ba maano a mmuso ona.
ssw: tindvuna letibukene nemphumela lotsite, titawusayina namengameli sivumelwano lesichaza ngalokubanti ngekusebenta kwato.

sot: lenaneong la rona la 2010, re batla ho ntlafatsa bokgoni ba bana ba rona ba ho bala, ho ngola le ho etsa dipalo dilemong tsa motheo.
ssw: lesivumelwano sitawuchaza kutsi yini lokumele yentiwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhatsini lesinganani nekutsi ngutiphi tindlela tekukala kanye netinsita letitawusetjentiswa.

sot: re batla barutwana le matitjhere ba be sekolong, ka phaposing, ka nako, ba ithuta le ho rutwa bakeng sa dihora tse supileng ka letsatsi.
ssw: njengobe nati, sitibophetele etintfweni letisihlanu letisetulu eluhlwini: imfundvo, temphilo, kutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya, kusungula imisebenti lemihle kanye nekulwa nebugebengu.

sot: re tla thusa matitjhere ka ho ba neha boitokisetso ba letsatsi le letsatsi bo tebileng.
ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, sitawusebentela kwenta ncono kusebenta kahle kwahulumende wasemakhaya, kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti kanye nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu.

sot: bakeng sa barutwana, re tla nehelana ka dibuka tse tla sebediswang ha bonolo ka dipuo tsohle tse 11. ho tloha selemong sena ho ya pele, barutwana bohle ba kereiti ya boraro, ya botshelela le ya bo robong ba tla ngola dihlahlobo tsa litherasi le nyumerasi tse lekotsweng ka boikemelo.
ssw: sitsembisa kwenta iminyakato leyinsika lelibangise ekutfolweni kwalemiphumela.

sot: sepheo sa rona ke ho nyolla sekgahla sa ho pasa bakeng sa ditlhatlhobo tsena ho tloha palohareng ya hona jwale 35% le tse 40% ho ya ho tse 60% ka 2014. sephetho se tla romellwa batswadi ho lekola tswelopele.
ssw: sibeke imfundvo nekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono enkhabeni yetinchubomgomo talohulumende.

sot: re rerile ho nyolla palo ya barutwana ba materiki ba lokelang ho kena yunivesithi ho fihla ho 175 000 ka selemo ho ya ho selemo sa 2014. re kgothaletsa batswadi ho sebetsa mmoho le rona ho atlehisa morero ona.
ssw: sifuna bafundzi nemathishela babe sesikolweni, eklasini, ngesikhatsi, bafundza futsi bafundzisa ema-awa lasikhombisa ngelusuku.

sot: re amohela peho ya kgwedi e fetileng e entsweng ke mekgatlo e meraro ya matitjhere, naptosa, sadtu and saou, ka ho thatiselletsa boitlamo ba bona bakeng sa letsholo la boleng ba ho ithuta le ho ruta ho tloha qalong ya 2010. ditho tse hlomphehileng,re lokela ho tsetela batjheng ba rona ho netefatsa hore re na le lebotho le rupelletsweng le basebetsi ba nang le bokgoni bakeng sa ho tshehetsa kgolo le tlhahiso ya mesebetsi.
ssw: sitawusita bothishela ngekubanikela luhlelo lwetifundvo lwemalanga onkhe loluchaza kabanti.

sot: ha ho le jwalo, re ikemiseditse ho nyolla thupello ya ba dilemong tse 16-25 ditsing tsa thuto le thupello e tswellang.
ssw: kubafundzi, sitawuniketela ngetincwadzi temsebenti lokumalula kutisebentisa letibhalwe ngato tonkhe tilwimi letili-11.

sot: sena se tla etsa hore re fane ka monyetla wa bobedi thutong, bakeng sa barutwana ba sa fihlellang ho kena yunivesithi.
ssw: kusukela kulomnyaka kuya embili, onkhe emabanga lesi-3, 6 nele-9 batawubhala tivivinyo tekukwati kubhala nekubala kanye netenyumeresi lokutivivinyo letitawenganyelwa ngalokutimele.

sot: re sebetsa le ditheo tsa thuto e phahameng ho netefatsa hore barutwana ba lokelang ba fumana thuso ya ditjhelete, ka sekema sa setjhaba sa thuso ya baithuti ka ditjhelete.
ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, ngasinye setikolo tetfu letingu-27 000 sitawuhlolwa tikhulu telitiko lemfundvo lesisekelo.

sot: hapehape re loketse ho phahamisa lenane la batjha ba kenelang dithupelo tsa mosebetsi mafapheng a poraefete le a mmuso.
ssw: sihlose kwenyusa linani lebafundzi bamatikuletjeni labakhona kwemukelwa emanyuvesi kutsi lifinyelele ku-175 000 ngemnyaka nga-2014.

sot: sena se kenyelatsa kaho le ntlafatso ya dipetlele le ditliliniki, le ho ntlafatsa maemo a tshebetso a basebeletsi ba tsa bophelo.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,kumele sisise kulusha lwetfu kute sicinisekise kutsi sinetisebenti letinemakhono naletikwatiko kusebenta kute kwesekelwe kukhula nekusungulwa kwemisebenti.

sot: re imatahantse le banka ya ntshetsopele ya aforika e borwa ho ntlafatsa tshebetso ya dipetlele tsa setjhaba le diofisi tsa tsona tsa ditereke.
ssw: ngaloko sihlela kwandzisa kuceceshwa kwalabaneminyaka yebudzala lengu-16-25 etikhungweni temfundvo nekucecesha.

sot: re bile re sebetsa mmoho le banka ya ntshetsopele ya aforika e borwa le koporasi ya ntshetsopele ya diindaseteri, lenaneong la mmuso la ho matahanya tshebedisano mahareng a mekgatlo ya poraefete le ya mmuso bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa dipetlele le phano ya ditjhelete bakeng sa diporojeke.
ssw: loku kutasenta sikwati kuniketa imfundvo litfuba lesibili, kulabo labangakulungeli kuya emanyuvesi.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehileng,re lokela ho tobana le nnete ya hore tebello ya nako ya ho phela ha masea a hlahang, e theohile ho tloha dilemong tse 60 ka 1994 ho ya ka tlasenyana ho dilemo tse 50 kajeno.
ssw: sisebentisana netikhungo temfundvo lephakeme kute kucinisekiswe kutsi bafundzi labakulungele batfola lusito lwetimali, ngeluhlelo lwavelonkhe lwekusita bafundzi ngetimali.

sot: ha ho le jwalo re etsa boitshunyako ba ho theola sekgahla sa ho shwa ha bomme ba masea ho fokotsa tshwaetso tse ntjha tsa hiv le ho phekola hiv le tb ka ho phethahala.
ssw: siphindze satibekela emanani ekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono, kute kukhicitwe labanye bonjiniyela nabochwepheshe, kuphindze kwenyuswe linani labothishela labakufanele kufundzisa tibalo nesayensi.

sot: re tla boela re fokotsa ho shwa ha masea ka lenaneo le matla la kentelo.
ssw: kumele futsi senyuse linani lalabasha labangenela tinhlelo tekufundza ngemisebenti emikhakheni letimele nasemkhakheni wahulumende.

sot: mosebetsi o matla o se o le motjheng bakeng sa ho netefatsa hore mosebetsi oo o nakong.
ssw: lomunye umphumela lobalulekile kucinisekisa imphilo lendze nalekahle yato tonkhe takhamiti teleningizimu afrika.

sot: re tla boela re tswela pele ka boitokisetso ba ho theha tsela ya setjhaba ya inshorense ya bophelo bo botle.
ssw: sitawuchubeka nekwenta ncono luhlelo lwetfu lwetemphilo.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,re sebetsa ka thata ho netefatsa hore motho e mong le e mong a ikutlwe a bolokehile le hore o bolokehile ka hara aforika borwa.
ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kulungisa tibhedlela nemitfolamphilo, kanye nekwenta ncono timo tekusebenta tetisebenti tetemphilo.

sot: re tla ntshetsapele mosebetsi wa rona wa ho fokotsa ditlolo tse mpe le tse nang le merusu tsa molao, le ho netefatsa hore tsela ya rona ya toka e sebetsa ka ho phethahala.
ssw: sibambisene nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kute kwentiwe ncono kusebenta kwetibhedlela temmango kanye nemahhovisi ato etifundza.

sot: re ntse re kenya tshebetsong meralo ya ho eketsa lenane la mapolesa a banna le basadi ka 10% dilemong tse tharo tse tlang.
ssw: siphindze sisebentisane nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kanye nenhlangano letfutfukisa timboni, eluhlelweni lwebudlelwane kuhulumende nalabatimele kute kwentiwe ncono tibhedlela kanye nekusita imiklamo ngetimali.

sot: re hlwaile ntwa kgahlanong le ho nkelwa dikoloi ha batho ka mahahapa, tlatlapo ya ditsha tsa kgwebo le matlong, mmoho le ditlolo tsa molao tse jwaloka polao, peto le ho otlwa, e le tsona tse ka sehlohong.
ssw: ngako siyangenelela ngenhloso yekunciphisa emazinga ekufa kwebantfwana lababelekwako, kute kuncishiswe kwesuleleka ngesandvulelangculazi lokusha kanye nekwelashwa kwesandvulelangculazi nesifo sesifuba ngalokuyimphumelelo.

sot: ka dinako tsohle ha re beng malala a laotswe ho fana ka tlhahiso leseding ya diketso tsa botloko tsebe sepoleseng.
ssw: sitakwenta tonkhe tetsembiso lesatenta ngelusuku lwengculazi lwemhlabawonkhe letimayelana netindlela letinsha tekuvikela nekwelapha sandvulelangculazi.

sot: tshebedisano mmoho etla lwantsha botloko tsebe.
ssw: umsebenti uyachubeka kute kucinisekiswe kutsi umsebenti uhambisana nesikhatsi lesibekiwe.

sot: baheso le baeti ba hlomphehang, mmuso wa lehae o lokela ho sebetsa.
ssw: takhamiti taseningizimu afrika,sisebenta kamatima kucinisekisa kutsi wonkhe umuntfu eningizimu afrika utiva aphephile kanye nekutsi kuphephile.

sot: bomasepala ba lokela ho ntlafatsa phano ya matlo, metsi, tlhweko, motlakase, taolo ya matlakala le ditsela.
ssw: sitawuchubekisela embili umsebenti wetfu wekunciphisa bugebengu lobukhulu nalobuneludlame, siphindze sicinisekise kutsi luhlelo lwetebulungiswa lusebenta kahle.

sot: re ile ra tshwara kopano le bomajoro le balaodi ba bomasepala selemong se fetileng.
ssw: setfula tinhlelo tekwenyusa linani lemaphoyisa ngemaphesenti lalishumi kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako.

sot: re ile ra boela ra etela baahi le bomasepala ba fapaneng, ho kenyeletsa balfour e mpumalanga le thembisa e gauteng.
ssw: sikhombe kulwa nekutsatselwa timoto, kwebelwa kwemabhizimisi netindlu, kanye nebugebengu lobenteka ngekutsintsana lobunjengekubulala, kuhlukumeta ngekwelucansi kanye nekushaya, njengetintfo letisetulu eluhlwini lwetintfo letibalulekile.

sot: re sa boela re phetha hore ha hona dingongoreho tse ka etsang hore batho ba etse merusu le ho senya thepa.
ssw: asitibandzakanye netinkhundla temmango letibukene nekuphepha.

sot: selemong sena sa tshebetso, ha re sebetseng mmoho ho etsa hore mmuso wa lehae e be boikarabelo ba rona kaofela.
ssw: ngekusebentisana sitabehlula bugebengu.

sot: re sebeletsa ho ntlafatsa bodulo le ho fana ka ditshebeletso bathong ba mekhukhu e dutseng tulong tse hantle tse hlwahlwa le ho fana le ditokelo tsa naha ho bonyane matlo a 500 000 ka 2014. re rera ho behella ka thoko dihektare tse 6 000 tsa naha e dutseng hantle bakeng sa ba amohelang meputso e tlase le matlo a kgonehang.
ssw: bakitsi netivakashi letihloniphekile,bohulumende basekhaya kumele basebente.

sot: ntlafatso e ntjha ya bohlokwa e tla ba ho kenyeletsa batho bao meputso ya bona e phahameng haholo ho re ba ka fumana ditshehetso tsa mmuso, empa ba amohela tjhelete e tlase hore ba ka fumana kadimo bankeng.
ssw: bomasipala kumele bente ncono kuniketelwa kwetindlu, emanti, tekuhanjiswa kwemangcoliso, gezi, kutfutfwa kwetibi kanye nemigwaco.

sot: re kenya mokgwa wa letlole la tiisetso la r1 bilione ho kgothaletsa dibanka tsa poraefete le lekala la matlo, ho kgakola dihlahiswatse ntjha tse tla shebana le tlhoko ya bodulo.
ssw: sibambe umhlangano nabosodolobha kanye nebaphatsi babomasipala emnyakeni lowengcile.

sot: baheso,selemong se fetileng re itse, batho ba mahaeng le bona ba na le tokelo ya ho ba le motlakase, metsi, matlwana a tsamaiswang ka metsi le ditsela.
ssw: loku kunikete litfuba lekubona tintfo letingabonakali ngetincabhayi lebanato bohulumende basekhaya.

sot: ra re ba tshwanetse ho ba le ditsi tsa boikgathollo le dipapadi hammoho le ditsi tsa mabenkele tse jwaloka tse metsemeholong.
ssw: siphindze savakashela imimango nabomasipala labehlukehlukene, kufaka ekhatsi ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.

sot: tabeng ena, re kgakotse setsha sa pele sa teko sa lenaneo le phatlaletseng la ntshetsopele ya mahae giyani, limpopo, ka phato selemong se fetileng.
ssw: ngemuva kwekuvakashela ebalfour, sitfumele litsimba lemalunga layimfica etindvuna kutsi avakashele lendzawo kute ayewubukana netindzaba letiphakanyiswe ngummango.

sot: ho tloha ka nako eo, matlo a 231 a ahilwe.
ssw: tindzaba letinyenti setivele tiyabukisiswa.

sot: tswelopele e se e entswe bakeng sa ho fana ka motheo wa setjhaba ho tshehetsa ntshetsopele ya temo, le kwetliso bakeng sa baahi.

ssw: sesakhe tikhungo leticinile tentsandvo yelinyenti.

sot: re bitletse mmuso o se nang demokrasi, o se nang boemedi, wa kgatello o bile o le bonyofonyofo o neng o sebeletsa ba mmalwa.
ssw: siwungcwabile umbuso welubandlululo lobewungasiyo intsandvo yelinyenti, lobewungameleli, ugcilatana ukhohlakele futsi lebewusebentela lidlantana.

sot: re bopile mmuso wa demokrasi o kopaneng, o se nang kgethollo ya morabe o arabelang o bile o emetse maaforika borwa ohle.
ssw: sakhe hulumende wentsandvo yelinyenti longabandlululi ngekwebulili, ngekwebuhlanga, lotiphendvulelako ubuye umelele bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika.

sot: re theile demokrasi ya molaotheo e hlamaselang, ka makala a mmuso a sebetsang hantle – ketsamelao, phethahatso le boahlodi.
ssw: sakhe intsandvo yelinyenti lebuswa ngumtsetfosisekelo lonemphumelo, lonetinhlaka tembuso letisebenta kahle kakhulu – sishayamtsetfo, sigungu lesiphetse netebulungiswa.

sot: re na le ditheo tsa kgaolo ya 9 tse tshehetsang demokrasi di bile di tshireletsa ditokelo tsa baahi.
ssw: sinetikhungo tahulumende letesekela intsandvo yelinyenti tibuye tivikele emalungelo etakhamiti.

sot: tokoloho le demokrasi le tsona di theile lepatlelo la setjhaba se sebetsang le mediya e lokolohileng.
ssw: inkhululeko nentsandvo yelinyenti nako kwakhe sikhala semmango lonemdlandla kanye nebetindzaba labakhululekile.

sot: tokoloho e boetse e tlisitse tshepiso ya tekano ya bong, lekgetlo la pele.
ssw: inkhululeko ibuye yaletsa kwekucala ngca, setsembiso sekulingana ngekwebulili.

sot: boemedi ba basadi bo eketsehile haholo ditheong tsa mmuso haesale ho tloha ka mafube a tokoloho, athe katoloso ya ditshebeletso tsa mantlha le yona e thusa basadi.
ssw: kumelelwa kwabomake kutikhungo tahulumende kukhule kakhulu kusukela ekucaleni kwenkhululeko, futsi nekukhuliswa kwetinsitanchanti nako kuyabazuzisa bomake.

sot: makgetha ana ohle a entse aforika borwa hore e be sebaka se betere ho phela ho sona jwale ho feta neng kapa neng.
ssw: onkhe lamagalelo ente iningizimu afrika yaba yindzawo lencono kakhulu kutsi kuhlalwe kuyo manje kunangaphambilini.

sot: leha ho le jwalo, naha ya rona e ntse e tobane le diphephetso tse tharo tsa bofuma, ho se lekane le leqeme la mesebetsi, tseo re tswelang pele ho lwantshana le tsona.
ssw: nanoma kunjalo, live letfu lisebukene netinselele tebuphuya, kungalingani nekungabi khona kwemisebenti, lesiloku sibukene nako.

sot: ho sebetsana le diphephetso tsena e bile setsiketsi sa tsepamiso ya maikutlo ya botsamaisi bohle ba demokrasi.
ssw: kubukana naletinselele sekube nguyonantfo lebalulekile lekugcilwe kuyo yabo bonkhe buphatsi bentsandvo yelinyenti.

sot: re kgethile ho tsepamisa maikutlo dinthong tse hlano tse ka sehloohong e leng thuto, bophelo bo botle, twantsho ya ditlolo tsa molao le bonyofonyofo, ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng le tlhabollo ya naha esita le ho thea mesebetsi e metle.
ssw: sikhetse kugcila etintfweni letisihlanu letihamba embili, temfundvo, temphilo, kulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo, kutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemaphandleni nekulungiswa kabusha kwemhlaba kanye nekwakha imisebenti lenesitfunti.

sot: re boetse re hlophisitse botjha mmuso ho ntlafatsa tshebetso.
ssw: siphindze futsi sahlela kabusha umbuso kute kutfutfukiswe kusebenta.

sot: re theile ditshebetso tse pedi tsa bohlokwa, thero ya nako e telele esita le bodisa le tlhahlobo.
ssw: sente imisebenti lemibili lemikhulu, kuhlela kwesikhatsi lesidze kanye nekulandzelela nekuhlola.

sot: re theile khomishene ya merero ya naha e tswetseng morero wa ntshetsopele ya naha (ndp), e leng merero ya naha ka botebo ebile e le enngwe ya dikatleho tse ka sehloohong tsa botsamaisi bona ba bone.
ssw: sisungule ikhomishini yekuhlela yavelonkhe lekhicite lesikhonkhwane luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa lwavelonkhe, lokuluhlelo lwalelive lwetenhlalo netemnotfo nalokungulokunye lokuzuziwe lokukhulu kwalohulumende wesine.

sot: morero o rala seo re tshwanelang ho se etsa ho fedisa bofuma, ho eketsa mesebetsi le ho fokotsa ho se lekane ka 2030. bodisa ba rona le tlhahlobo di bontsha hore ditshebeletso tse ngata di ntse di tswala pele ho ntlafala.
ssw: loluhlelo lubeka kabanti ngalokufanele sikwente kute sicedze buphuya, kukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti nekunciphisa kungalingani kungakefiki umnyaka wa-2030.

sot: ho tea mohlala, dithekolohelo tsa ditjhelete setjhabeng le ditokomane tsa boitsebiso jwale di se di nka nako e kgutshwane ho phethelwa.
ssw: kulandzelela nekuhlola kwetfu kukhombisa kutsi tinsita letinyenti tiyachubeka nekuba ncono.

sot: empa tse ding tse ngata di ntse di hloka ho ntlafatswa.
ssw: kepha letinye letinyenti tisadzinga kusetjentwa lokuchubekako.

sot: ke tla tlaleha ka tse hlano tse ka sehloohong, ke qala ka moruo.
ssw: ngitawetfula umbiko ngaloku lokusihlanu lokuhamba embili, ngitawucala ngetemnotfo.

sot: ka kakaretso, moruo o hotse ka 3,2% ka selemo ho tloha ka 1994 ho ya ho 2012 ntle le putlamo ya moruo lefatsheng e fedisitseng mesebetsi e milione.
ssw: ngalokusemkhatsini, umnotfo ukhule ngemaphesenthi lama-3,2 ngemnyaka kusuka nga-1994 kuya ku-2012 nanoma nje umnotfo bewubutsakatsaka emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele lokwabanga kutsi kulahleke imisebenti lesigidzi.

sot: ho sebetseng mmoho re le mmuso le lekala la kgwebo, mesebetsi le setjhaba, re kakasitse moruo ho o tsosolosa.
ssw: ngekusebentisana sonkhe njengahulumende, bemabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango, siwunakekele lomnotfo wate wavuka.

sot: maruo a naha, a lekanngwang ka tsela ya ntshetsopele ya kgolo (gdp), a hotse ho ya feta r3,5 trilione.
ssw: umcebo wavelonkhe, nawukalwa ngekwemkhicito lomkhulu wasekhaya (gdp), ukhule waba ngetulu kwa-3,5wetigidzigidzi letiphindvwe katsatfu temarandi.

sot: jwale mesebetsi e thewa hape.
ssw: imisebenti manje iyasungulwa futsi.

sot: ho na le batho ba dimilione tse 15 jwale ba sebetsang naheng, lenane le hodimo ka ho fetisisa nalaneng ya rona, athe mesebetsi e fetang 650 000 e ile ya thewa ngwahola, ho ya ka ba tsa lefapha la dipalopalo la aforika borwa.
ssw: manje sekunebantfu labatigidzi leti-15 labasebentako, linani lelikhulu kakhulu lelike labakhona kulelive, futsi kulomnyaka lophelile kuvulwe imisebenti lenge-650 000, ngekuya kwelihhovisi lelubalobalo laseningizimu afrika.

sot: hona ho ntse ho sa lekana.
ssw: loku solo akusiko lokukahle ngalokwenele.

sot: leqeme la mesebetsi le ntse le le hodimo.
ssw: silinganisonani sekungacashwa solomane sisetulu.

sot: leqeme la mesebetsi batjheng ba aforika borwa le ntse le tswela pele ho ngongorehisa, jwaloka ha ho le jwalo lefatshe lohle.
ssw: kucashwa kwelusha eningizimu afrika kusachubeka nekuba yintfo leletsa kukhatsateka, njengoba kwenteka mhlaba wonkhe jikelele.

sot: re nka dikgato tse ngatanyana, ho akga le molao wa ditsiane tsa lekgetho la mesebetsi o kgothaletsang bahiri ho hira basebetsi bao e leng batjha.
ssw: sitsatsa tinyatselo letinyenti, letifaka ekhatsi umtsetfo wekukhutsata intsela yekucashwa lokhutsata bacashi kutsi bacashe tisebenti letilusha.

sot: ho tla etswa melawana ho netefatsa hore sena ha se ame basebetsi ba sa tshehetswang ka ditjhelete kapa ba seng ba hodile, hampe.
ssw: kutawukhishwa imitsefosimiso letawucinisekisa kutsi loku akutsintsi kabi tisebenti letingatfoli selekelelo nalesetikhulile.

sot: dikgato tse ding di fuperwe ke selekane sa naha sa batjha se tekennweng soweto ngwahola ka mmesa.
ssw: letinye tinyatselo ticuketfwe kusivumelwano selusha savelonkhe lesasayinwa esoweto ngamabasa lowendlulile.

sot: lenaneo la katoloso ya mesebetsi ya setjhaba le lenaneo la mesebetsi ya dibaka a tswela pele ho ba seikokotlelo sa bafutsana le batjha.
ssw: luhlelo lwetemisebenti lekhulisiwe yahulumende kanye neluhlelo lwemisebenti yahulumende kuyachubeka nekuba siphephelo lesinemandla salabaphuyile kanye nelusha.

sot: re theile menyetla e 3,7 milione ya mesebetsi dilemong tse hlano tse fetileng.
ssw: sakhe ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi leti-3.7 kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.

sot: batho ba habo rona ba fumana tjheletenyana le tsebo lenaneong la mesebetsi ya setjhaba, tseo ba di sebedisang ho batla mesebetsi e tsitsitseng.
ssw: bantfu betfu batfola imali lengenako nemakhono eluhlelweni lwetemisebenti yahulumende, labawasebentisela kutfola kucashwa lokuhlelekile.

sot: kabinete e entse pehelo ya menyetla ya mosebetsi e dimilione tse 6 ho tloha monongwaha ho ya ho 2019, e tsepamisitse maikutlo batjheng.
ssw: ikhabhinethi itibekele umgomo wekusungula ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi letisitfupha kusukela kulomnyaka kuye ku-2019, kucondvwe lusha.

sot: lenaneo la rona la thuso ya setjhaba, leo hajwale le fihlellang bathong ba ka bang dimilione tse 16, le fana ka polokeho ho dimilione tsa batho, haholoholo bana ba kotsing.
ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekusita kutenhlalo manje lolufinyelela kubantfu labatigidzi leti-16, luniketa tekuphepha kubantfu labatigidzi, ikakhulu bantfwana labasengotini.

sot: malapa a mangata a thuseha ka lebaka la dithekolohelo tsa mmuso, tjhelete ya bana, penshene ya metsofe le ba holofetseng.
ssw: imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngenca yetibonelelo tahulumende, imali yebantfwana, impesheni yalabadzala neyalabakhubatekile.

sot: dithekolohelo tsena di tla nne di tswele pele hobane malapa a mangata a fumana thuso kaha menyetla ya mesebetsi e fokola ka nakong ena eo moruo o putlameng.
ssw: letibonelelo titawuchubeka njalo ngoba imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngobe ematfuba emisebenti ayimvelalakancane ngalesikhatsi semnotfo lobutsakatsaka.

sot: menyetla ena e fumanehang mmusong e etsa hore re bue ka ho ikgantsha re re, aforika borwa eo re phelang ho yona e betere haholo ho e na le eo re neng re phela ho yona pele ho 1994. baheso,re ntse re le nakong e boima.
ssw: lamatfuba latfolakala kuhulumende, enta kutsi sisho ngekutigcabha sitsi, iningizimu afrika lesiphila kuyo lamuhla, incono kakhulu kunaleyo besiphila kuyo ngembi kwa-1994.

sot: diketsahalo tsa moruo wa amerika di lebisitse ho nyotobeleng ka potlako ha ditjhelete tsa mebaraka e ntseng e thuthua.
ssw: tintfo letenteka emnotfweni wasemelika setiholele ekuweni kwetimakethe tetimali lebetisavela, kufaka ekhatsi lirandi.

sot: nakong ya 2013, ranta e nyotobetse ka 17.6% kgahlanong le dolara ya amerika.
ssw: nga-2013, lirandi lehle nga-17,6 wemaphesenthi nalicatsaniswa nelidola lasemelika.

sot: sekgahla se fokolang sa kananyetsano se momme kotsi e kgolo ho infleishene mme se tla boela se etsa hore lenaneo la rona la meralo ya motheo le je tjhelete e ngata le ho feta.
ssw: silinangisonani sekuntjintjiselana siveta ingoti lenkhulu yekwehla nekwenyuka kwentsengo.

sot: leha ho le jwalo, dikhamphane tsa diyantle, haholoholo lekaleng la tlhahiso, di tshwanela ho nka monyetla wa ranta e fokolang le ho iphumana ho matla moruong wa lefatshe.
ssw: nanoma kunjalo, tinkampani letitfumela imphahla ngaphandle kulamanye emave, ikakhulu umkhakha lokhicitako, kufanele tisebentise lelitfuba lekwehla kwemandla elirandi kanye nekuvuka lokunemandla emaveni emhlaba.

sot: leha re ntse re na le mathata ana, re a tseba hore re ka rakalla nakong ya qhaqhangqhang ena.
ssw: njengoba sisenaletinselele, siyati kutsi singamelana nalesikhatsi sebumatima.

sot: re entse jwalo dilemong tse hlano tse fetileng.
ssw: sente njalo phambilini kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.

sot: hantlentle, re tla bitoha re le matla le ho feta haeba re etsa dintho tse nepahetseng.
ssw: sitawuvuka, ecinisweni, sitawuvuka sinemandla kunaphambilini nasingenta tintfo letifanele.

sot: re tshwanela ho sebetsa mmoho re le mmuso, kgwebo le basebetsi ho hodisa moruo wa rona sekgahla kahodimo ho 5% hore re tle re kgone ho thea mesebetsi eo re e hlokang.
ssw: sifanele sisebentisane singuhulumende, temabhizinisi netisebenti kute sikhulise umnotfo wetfu ngesilinganiso lesingetulu kwemaphesenti lasihlanu kute kutsi sikhone kwakha imisebenti lesiyidzingako.

sot: ka lehlohonolo tshebedisanommoho ena e se e ntse e etsahala.
ssw: ngenhlanhla lenhle lokusebentisana sekuvele kuyenteka.

sot: e a etsahala ho ntshetsopele ya moruo wa naha le lekgotla la mesebetsi eo e leng se seng sa ditheo tsa bohlokwa tsa tshebedisanommoho demokrasing ya rona, dipakeng tsa makala a mmuso, kgwebo, basebetsi le setjhaba.
ssw: kwenteka ku-nedlac lekungulesinye setikhungo letibalulekile tekusebentisana kuntsandvo yetfu yelinyenti, emkhatsini wahulumende, temabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango.

sot: e etsahetse esita le dipuisanong tseo re bileng le tsona le ba kgwebo.
ssw: kwenteke ngisho nasekukhulumisaneni lebesiba nako nemmango wetemabhizinisi.

sot: ngwahola ke ile ka qala ho buisana le ba kgwebo ka dikgato tse totobetseng tseo mmuso o ka di nkang ho nolofatsa ho etsa kgwebo naheng ya rona.
ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile ngicale kubandzakanya temabhizinisi etinyatselweni letitsite hulumende langatitsatsa kute kube lula kuchuba emabhizinisi kulelive lakitsi.

sot: ka lebaka la dipuisano tseo, jwale re hlophisitse botjha dikananelo tsa melawana le dilaesense bakeng sa ditshekatsheko tsa thefuleho ya tikoloho, dilaesense tsa metsi le dilaesense tsa merafo.
ssw: lokwavela kuleyo nchubo kutsi manje, sesente kuvunywa kwekulawula nekuniketa emalayisensi ekuhlola lifutse letesimondzawo, emalayisensi emanti newasemayini kusebente kahle kakhulu nangemphumelelo.

sot: palamente e phethela diphetolo tsa molao e le ho fana ka monyetla wa ho thakgoha ha tswelopele e ntle ena, e tla pukutla hore matsatsi a be katlase ho 300, e leng nako ya ho qala morafo, ho tloha ho kenngweng ha kopo ho ya dikananelong tsa ho qetela.
ssw: iphalamende isaphotfula tichibiyelo temtsetfo lotawunika emandla lentfuntfuko lenhle, kutawenteka ngaphansi kwemalanga lange-300, sikhatsi lesitsatfwako nakucalwa imayini, kusukela nakufakwa sicelo kudzimate kube sekuvunyweni kwekugcina.

sot: motlatsi wa moporesidente wa rephaboliki o tswela pele ho hlophisa dipuisano dipakeng tsa mmuso, dikhamphane tsa merafo le basebetsi.
ssw: lisekela lamengameli weriphabhulikhi liyachubeka nekuchuba tingcoco emkhatsini wahulumende, tinkampani tetimayini kanye netisebenti.

sot: sepheo ke ho tsitsisa dikamano tsa indasteri lekaleng lena la bohlokwa la moruo wa rona.
ssw: inhloso yaloku kusimamisa tebudlelwane kutetimboni kulomkhakha lobalulekile wetemnotfo wetfu.

sot: mosebetsi ona o tla le diphetho tse ntle.
ssw: lenchubo ikhipha imiphumela.

sot: diteraeke tse bileng teng lekaleng di ne di le mmalwa di bile di le kgutshwane ngwahola.
ssw: titeleka kulomnyaka lophelile kulomkhakha tibe mbalwa futsi taba tesikhatsi lesincane.

sot: e nngwe ya bohlokwa le ho feta, diketsahalo tsa dikamano tsa indasteri di etsahala ka mokgwa o tsamaisanang le molao.
ssw: futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu kutsi, tinchubo tetetimboni tenteka ngekuhambisana nemtsetfo ngalokungagucuki.

sot: re namotse ho tsa morafo hobane ke e nngwe ya bahlahisi ba rona ba bohlokwa ba mesebetsi.
ssw: siye sangenelela kutetimayini ngobe ngutona letibaluleke kakhulu ekwakheni ematfuba emisebenti.

sot: re hloka lekala la merafo le sebetsang.
ssw: sidzinga umkhakha wetimayini losebentako.

sot: merafo e hira batho ba fetang halofo ya milione.
ssw: timayini ticasha bantfu labangetulu kwahhafu wesigidzi.

sot: naheng ya rona ke yona e fumanang tjhelete e ngata ka ho fetisisa dikananyetsanong tsa bolata.
ssw: ngutona letingumkhakha lomkhulu wemali lengenako levela emaveni angaphandle kulelive letfu.

sot: e boela e kenya letsoho ka tjhelete e ka bang r20 bilione ka kotloloho pokellong ya lekgetho.
ssw: tibuye futsi tifake tigidzigidzi letinge-20 temarandi letingena ngco kumalingena yentsela.

sot: merafo e boela e kenya letsoho haholwanyane e le bareki ba dintho le ditshebeletso, ebile ke bafepedi ba dintho makaleng a mang a moruo wa rona esita le meruo e meng lefatsheng ka bophara.
ssw: tetimayini tibuye futsi kube ngito letifaka sandla kakhulu njengemtsengi wemphahla netinsita, kanye nemfakigalelo kuleminye imikhakha yemnotfo wetfu naleminye iminotfo emhlabeni jikelele.

sot: re utolla selekane le ba amehang ho rarolla qaka ya matlo ditoropong tse nang le merafo.
ssw: sihlola kubambisana nalabatsintsekako kute kubukwe ludzaba lwetindlu tekuhlala emadolobheni lanetimayini.

sot: e re ke boele ke hopotse dikhamphane tsa merafo hore 2014 ke selemo sa ho qetela ho bona hore ba ntlafatse matlo le maemo a bodulo a basebetsi ba merafong esita le ho fihlella dipehelo tse ngatanyana.
ssw: akengiphindze futsi ngikhumbute tinkampani tetimbiwa kutsi 2014 ngumncamulajucu wato wekutfutfukisa tetindlu netimo tekuhlala tebavukuti kanye nekuzuza lokunyeti lokuhlosiwe.

sot: mmuso o tswela pele ho bea leihlo le ho qobella boikamahanyo mererong ya khamphane ya setjhaba le basebetsi esita le dipehelo tsa tumellano ya merafo.
ssw: hulumende uyachubeka nekulandzelela nekuphocelela kuhambisana kuko kokubili tinhlelo tetenhlalo netetisebenti tetimayini kanye nalokuhloswe yishatha yetimayini.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,ditho tse hlomphehang,ntle le merafo, re hlwaile bahlahisi ba bang ba bahlano ba mesebetsi ka 2009. bona ke bohahlaudi, temo, moruo o sa thefuleng tikoloho, kaho ya meralo ya motheo le tlhahiso.
ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,malunga lahloniphekile,ngaphandle kwetetimayini, sibuye satfola lokunye lokusihlanu lobekukhicita imisebenti nga-2009.

sot: indasteri ya bohahlaudi e hotse ka potlako.
ssw: loku bekutekuvakasha, tekulima, temnotfo letinganukubeti simondzawo nemvelo, kutfutfukiswa kwetakhiwonchanti netekukhicita.

sot: ka 1993, aforika borwa e amohetse bahahlaudi ba dimilione tse tharo feela.
ssw: nga-1993 iningizimu afrika yatfola tivakashi tangaphandle letitigidzi letintsatfu.

sot: ka 2012, lenane leo le hotse ho ya ho dimilione tse 13 tsa baeti.
ssw: nga-2012 lelinani lakhula laba tivakashi letitigidzi leti-13.

sot: re tla tswela pele ho hodisa indasteri ena, ka lebaka la bokgoni ba yona ba tlhahiso ya mesebetsi.
ssw: sitawuchubeka nekukhulisa lemboni, ngenca yekukhona kwakha imisebenti.

sot: ka 2012 re utollotse morero wa meralo ya motheo ya naha, o etelletsweng pele ke moporesidente ka khomishene ya moporesidente ya tlhophiso ya meralo ya motheo.
ssw: nga-2012 sitfule luhlelo lwetakhiwonchanti lwavelonkhe, loluholwa yikhomishini yekucondziswa kwesakhiwonchanti yelihhovisi lamengameli.

sot: ka lebaka leo re tsetetse trilione e le nngwe ya diranta meralong ya motheo ya setjhaba dilemong tse hlano tse fetileng.
ssw: ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi sikhone kutjala sigidzigidzi sinye lesiphindvwe katsatfu kutakhiwonchanti temmango kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.

sot: diprojeke tse ngata di se di phethetswe kapa di mathuleng a ho phethelwa.
ssw: leminyenti yalemiklamo seyiphotfuliwe noma seyidvute kuphotfulwa.

sot: ke tla ama tse mmalwa feela.
ssw: ngitawubala nje lembalwa.

sot: tsamaiso ya rea vaya ya johannesburg jwale e se e sebediswa ke baahi ba gauteng ba fetang 100 000. ditsamaiso tse tshwanang le eo di a ahwa motse kapa, tshwane, koung ya nelson mandela, buffalo city, ethekwini le rusternburg.
ssw: luhlelo lwemabhasi latfutsa aphindzelela i-rea vaya ejozi manje lusetjentiswa bahlali basegauteng labangetulu kwaba-100 000. tinhlelo letifana nalolu tiyakhiwa ekapa, etshwane, enelson mandela bay, ebuffalo city, ethekwini naserustenburg.

sot: boemakepe le madiboho tsa naha di ntlafaditswe.
ssw: lugu lolusikhumulo semikhumbi selwentiwe lwaba ncono.

sot: re ahile peipi e tsamaisang mafura ya bolelele ba dikilomitara tse 700 ho tloha durban ho ya gauteng ho tsamaisa dilithara tse bilione tsa peterole, tsa disile le mafura a difofane ka selemo.
ssw: sesakhe liphayiphi lekuhambisa emafutsa lelingemakhilomitha lasikhombisa lelisuka ethekwini liya egauteng kute litfutse tigidzigidzi letine temakhiyubhikhi emalitha aphethiloli, dizili naphethiloli wetindizamshini ngemnyaka.

sot: mebila kapa mela e metjha e ka etsang dikilomithara tse 1 500 e se e ahilwe.
ssw: sekwakhiwe imigwaco lemisha noma imizila lecishe ifike kumakhilomitha layi-1500.

sot: kgatelopele e mabapi le mebila e re hopotsa bao ba kileng ba sebeletsa mmuso ona pele, ba neng ba batla tse ntlentle bakeng sa naha ena, ba kang letona la mehleng la dipalangwang ntate dullar omar.
ssw: lenchubekelembili mayelana nemigwaco isikhumbuta labo labasebentele lohulumende phambilini labebafunela lelive lokuphuma embili, njengendvuna yetetitfutsi yaphambilini, umnu.

sot: mofumahadi wa hae mme farieda ke e mong wa baeti ba rona ba bohlokwa phirimaneng ena.
ssw: umkakhe lotsandzekako farieda ungulomunye wetivakashi tetfu lamuhla kusihlwa.

sot: kaho ya diporo tse ntjha e se e qadile mpumalanga, ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano mebileng.
ssw: kwakhiwa kwemizila lemisha yesitimela sekucalile empumalanga, kute kunciphise kugcwala kwetitfutsi emigwacweni.

sot: projeke ya gautrain jwale e sebetsa ka ho phethahetseng mme e pepa bapalami ba 1,2 ya dimilione ka kgwedi.
ssw: umklamo wegautrain manje usebenta ngalokuphelele futsi itfwala bagibeli labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-1,2 ngenyanga.

sot: eijensi ya diterene tsa baeti ya aforika borwa e tla sebedisa tjhelete e fetang r120 bilione dilemong tse 10 tse tlang ho reka diterene.
ssw: sikhungo sekutfwala bagibeli ngaloliwe saseningizimu afrika sitawusebentisa ngetulu kwetigidzigidzi leti-120 temarandi kuleminyaka lelishumi letako kutsenga titimela letinsha.

sot: transnet e kenya tshebetsong lewa la yona le leholohadi la kgolo ya mebaraka la diranta tse dibilione tse 300,mme e aha meralo ya metheo e hlokehang haholo ya dipalangwang.
ssw: i-transnet yetfula indlelalisu yayo lenkhulu yaloko lokudzingwa yimakethe lebita tigidzidzi temarandi letinge-300, yekwakha sakhiwonchanti setitfutsi lesidzingeka kakhulu.

sot: ho ananela bokgoni ba moruo wa kapa bophirimela le lebopo la bophirimela, re thakgotse lebatowa la ntshetsopele ya indasteri ya saldanha ra ba ra bula difeme tse pedi tse ntjha atlantis.
ssw: kute sitfole emandla etemnotfo lokhona enshonalanga kapa naselugwini lwasenshonalanga, setfule indzawo yekutfutfukisa timboni esaldanha sabuye futsi savula timboni letimbili letinsha e-atlantis.

sot: ho ntlafatsa phepelo ya metsi, matamo a mabedi a maholo a matjha a phethetswe, de hoop e limpopo le spring grove e kwazulu-natala, ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa projeke ya metsi a dihlaba a lesotho e tla thakgolwa haufinyane.
ssw: kute kwentiwe ncono kuphakelwa kwemanti, kuphotfulwe kwakhiwa kwemadamu lamakhulu lamabili, i-de hoop elimpopo kanye ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, bese kutsi umlente wesibili wemklamo i-lesotho highlands water wetfulwe madvute nje.

sot: kaho e tswela pele diteisheneng tse ntjha tsa motlakase, medupi e limpopo, kusile e mpumalanga le ingula e haufi le ladysmith, tse hirileng basebetsi ba fetang 30 000. re tswela pele ho utolla mehlodi e meng ya eneji, ho ya ka morero o kopantsweng wa eneji.
ssw: kwakha kuyachubeka esiteshini lesisha sekuphehla gezi, i-medupi elimpopo, i-kusile empumalanga ne-ingula dvutane naseladysmith, kucashwe tisebenti letingetulu kwe-300 000. siyachubeka nekufuna leminye imitfombo yemandla, ngekuhambisana neluhlelo loluhlanganisile lwemtfombo wemandlakutfutfukiswa kwemafutsa i-petroleum, ikakhulu gesi wetinhlese (shale) kutawuba nguyonantfo legucula indlela besisolomane senta ngayo tintfo esigodzini sasekaroo kanye nakumnotfo waseningizimu afrika .

sot: ho etswa peteroliamo, haholoholo kgase ya shale, ho tla tlisa phetoho e kgolo lebatoweng la karoo le moruong wa aforika borwa.
ssw: ngemuva kwekuhlola tingoti nematfuba, umtsetfosimiso wekugcina utawetfulwa madvute nje futsi utawulandzelwa ekucutjungulweni nasekukhishweni kwemalayisensi.

sot: kamora ho sekaseka dikotsi le menyetla, melawana ya ho qetela e tla ntshuwa haufinyane mme e tla latelwa ke ho etswa le ho neanwa ha dilaesense.
ssw: silindzele kuphetsa kutfolwa kwemamegawatsi latinkhulungwane letiyimfica nemakhulu lasitfupha emandla enuzi.

sot: re lebelletse ho phethela phumantsho ya dimegawatt tsa eneji ya nutlilere tse 9 600. baetsi ba mafura ba se ba kgethilwe mme ba se ba qadile ka mosebetsi.
ssw: emafutsa lakhiwa ngetitjalo akhetsiwe futsi asacalile kusebenta.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehanghwa rona ke naha e keneng kgabong mme ke sebaka se betetshana ho phela ho sona.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekilekwetfu nje, live lelisebenta mbamba futsi seliyindzawo lencono kakhulu yekuhlala.

sot: re tlameha ho boloka morolo oo.
ssw: sifanele kutsi singaphelelwa ngulomfutfo.

sot: ditho tse hlomphehang,boholo ba maruo a rona bo thewa ka inthanete kapa dikgokahanyo tsa difonofono.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,umnotfo wetfu lomunye lomnyenti wakheka ku-inthanethi noma ngetekuchumanisana.

sot: kheibole ya faeba ya bolelele ba dikilomitara tse 37 000 e kentswe ke makala a mmuso le setjhaba dilemong tse hlano tse fetileng.
ssw: intsambo yagezi lenemicu leminyenti lebudze lobungemakhilomitha lange-37 000 ifakwe ngumkhakha wangasese kanye newesive kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.

sot: sena se tla atollwa ka sekgahla se seholo dilemong tse tlang.
ssw: loku kutawukhuliswa kakhulu kuleminyaka letako.

sot: re motlotlo ka dikatleho tsa rona ho saense le thekenoloji.
ssw: siyatigcabha ngemiphumela yetfu kutesayensi nebucwepheshe.

sot: kaho ya thelesekoupu ya pele ya dikotlolo tse 64 pokellong ya sekwere sa kilomithara, meerkat, e tla phethelwa sehleng sa pele sa 2014. ditho tse hlomphehang,ditsiane tsa rona tsa ho tshehetsa tlhahiso di tlile le dipoelo.
ssw: kwakhiwa kwesikhulisikubona sekucala (telescope) lesinetindishi letinge-64 ku-sizindza sekucwaninga ngalokwenteka emhlabeni, i-meerkat, kutawuphotfulwa ngekota yekucala ya-2014.

sot: sekema sa matsete ho tsa makoloi se ileng sa thakgolwa ka 2009 se ananetse ditsiane tsa boleng ba diranta tse dibilione tse 3.8 bakeng sa matsete a diprojeke tse ka bang 160. diprojeke tsena di boloka mesebetsi e fetang dikete tse 50. dikhamphane di tla aha makoloi a manyenyane, ditekesi le dibese.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sinikamdlandla setfu sekukhuphula tekukhicita sesivete imiphumela lemihle.

sot: re tsitsisitse lekala le nnileng la fadisa mesebetsi la diaparo, masela, letlalo le dieta.
ssw: luhlelo lwelutjalomali lwetimoto lolwetfulwa nga-2009 seluvume tinikamandla letilingana samba lesitigidzigidzi leti-3,8 temarandi temiklamo yelutjalomali lengaba li-160.

sot: tsena di akga dibese, meroho e ka makanekaneng, diaparo, masela, letlalo le dieta le dintho tse ding.
ssw: letinkampani titawube tikhicita timoto letingema-sedan, emakhumbi nemabhasi.

sot: re na le mehlala e bonahalang ya katleho ya lenaneo la dihlahiswa tsa kahare ho naha.
ssw: sisungule umkhakha wetimphahla, tindvwangu, tikhumba kanye neticatfulo, lebewusolomane unciphisa imisebenti.

sot: bongata ba baindasteri ba batsho ba nang le thahasello ba tletleba ka mathata ao ba teanang le wona ho fumaneng ditjhelete tsa diindasteri, bafepedi le mebaraka ya thekiso, le tshehetso ya tlhahiso e bonahalang.
ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi emabhasi, tibhidvo letifakwe etikoteleni, tembatfo, tindvwangu, tikhumba neticatfulo kanye naleminye imikhicito.

sot: letlole la naha la matlafatso, koporasi ya ntshetsopele ya diindasteri le eijensi ya ditjhelete tsa dikgwebo tse nyenyane di tla tswela pele ho fana ka ditjhelete dikgwebong tse mahlahahlaha tsa batho ba batsho ho phahamisa ntshetsopele ya diindasteri.
ssw: sinetibonelo temphumelelo letibonakalako teluhlelo lwekwenta imikhicito kuleli lakitsi.

sot: ho feta moo, re kgothaletsa dikgwebo tse kgolo ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa diindasteri tsa batho ba batsho.
ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,sifanele sisebente ngekutikhandla lokukhulu kute sitfutfukise bosotimboni labasafufusa noma labamnyama.

sot: temo ke e nngwe ya bohlokwa tlhahisong ya mesebetsi mme e fana ka menyetla ya kgwebo.
ssw: linyenti labosotimboni labasafufusa likhonona ngebumatima lelihlangabetana nabo ekutfoleni timali tekwesekela timboni tabo, lababatsengisela imikhicito kanye netimakethe labangatsengisa kuto, kanye nekusitwa ngemikhicito ngekwethekhinikhi.

sot: lenaneo la rona la tshehetso ho tsa temo, fetsa tlala, le hlahisa bahwebi ba batjha ba diyantle.
ssw: sikhwama savelonkhe sekuhlomisa, nenhlangano yekutfutfukisa timboni kanye ne-ejensi lesita emabhizinisi lamancane ngetimali kutawuchubeka kunikete timali emabhizinisi lasebentako ebantfu labamnyama kute kukhutsatwe timboni.

sot: re tla tswela pele le ho phahamisa lekala la rona la botshwasi ba ditlhapi, le kenyang letsoho ka tjhelete e hakanyetswang r6 bilione moruong athe le fana ka mesebetsi e 27 000. ditho tse hlomphehang,re entse kgatelopele e ntle haholo lenaneong la kabobotjha ya mobu.
ssw: kwengeta, sikhutsata emabhizinisi lasasimeme kutsi asekele kutfutfukiswa kwemabhizinisi etimboni ebantfu labamnyama.

sot: haesale ho tloha ka 1994 mapolasi a ka bang 5 000, a boholo ba dihektare tse dimilione tse 4.2, a neilwe batho ba batsho, mme malapa a fetang 200 000 a fola molemo.
ssw: tekulima tiphuma embili ekuveteni ematfuba emisebenti nekuniketa ematfuba ekuba bosomabhizinisi.

sot: ditseko tsa mobu tse ka bang 80 000, tse akaretsang dihektare tse dimilione tse 3.4, di phethetswe mme batho ba dimilione tse 1.8 ba fotse molemo.
ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekwelekelela kutekulima, i-fetsa tlala (cedza indlala), lukhicita batsengisi labasha, labatsengisela lamanye emave.

sot: botsamaisi bo latelang bo tla tshwanela ho ntshetsapele dikgato tse ngatanyana tsa bokenadipakeng tse kang maano, ketso ya melao le tse ding tse bonahalang, ho tswela pele ho busetsa madulong taba ya kamoho ya mobu bathong ba habo rona.
ssw: balimi bemihlaba lemincane bekucala labange-88 kuloluhlelo banikete luhlelo lwekudla lwemhlaba lwamhlabuhlangene emathani emmbila lange-268 nemabhontjisi latfunyelwe elesotho kulenyanga lephelile.

sot: tsena di akga dintho tse amanang le ho thewa ha kantoro ya molekodi kakaretso wa boleng ebe ho bulelwa ho kenngwa ha ditseko.
ssw: sitawuchubeka nekutfutfukisa umkhakha wetfu wetekudvweba tinhlanti futsi, lofaka emarandi lalinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi letisitfupha nalobuye futsi uniketele ngemisbenti le-27 000. malunga lahloniphekile,sente inchubekelembili lenhle eluhlelweni lwekuhlelwa kabusha kwemhlaba.

sot: kahoo, re thabile ka hore ho na le keketseho e kgolo boingodisong ba bana dikolong, ho tloha sekolong sa dikonyana ho ya boemong ba thuto e phahameng.
ssw: lobuphatsi lobulandzelako butawudzinga kutsi buchubele embili tinchubomgomo letinyenti, umtsetfo loshayiwe nekungenelela lokubonakalako, kute kuchubekiselwe embili kulungisa kwemukwa umhlaba kwebantfu betfu balelive.

sot: palo ya bana ba ithutang kereiting ya r e eketsehile ho feta habedi, e tloha ho palo e ka bang 300 000 ho ya ho e fetang 700 000 dipakeng tsa 2003 le 2011. moralo wa nakwana wa leano o lebisang phihlellong e akaretsang ho kereiti ya r o se o hlophiseditswe tshwaelo ya setjhaba, ka sepheo sa ho etsa hore dithuto tsa kereiti ya r di tlame.
ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi tindzaba letiphatselene nekusungulwa kwelihhovisi lemhloli jikelele ngekwenta njalo kutawbe kuvulwa kufakwa kweticelo tekubuyiselwa umhlaba.

sot: baheso,bana ba dimlione tse 8 ha ba lefe dikolong, athe ba dimilione tse 9 ba fumana dijo tse nang le phepo tse tswang mmusong dikolong, hore ba tle ba ithute hantle ba se ke ba bolawa ke tlala.
ssw: malunga lahloniphekilenembala iningizimu afrika iyindzawo lencono yekuhlala.

sot: sekgahla sa ho atleha dithutong tsa materiki se nyolohile ho tloha ho 61% ka 2009 ho ya ho 78% ngwahola, athe dikatleho tsa ho ya ithuta diyunivesithi di ntlafala selemo le selemo.
ssw: kuyasijabulisa-ke kutsi likhule kakhulu linani lebantfwana lababhalisile etikolweni, kusukela kubokhewane kuye kutemfundvo lephakeme.

sot: ho phahamisa taba ya ho kenyeletswa ha ba bang le ho kopana ka ho se tshwane, kharikhulamo ya puo ya matshwao ya aforika borwa e tla rutwa dikolong ho tloha isao, ka 2015. re ekeditse manane a batho ba baholo ba tsebang ho bala le ho ngola ka lenaneo la kha ri gude ho tloha bathong ba dimilione tse 2,2 ka 2008 ho ya ho ba dimilione tse 3. re ne re ntse re tsetela le thupelong ya matitjhere mme re bula botjha dikholetjhe tsa thupelo ya matitjhere hore re rarolle bothata ba tlhokeho.
ssw: linani lebantfwana labafundza libanga r liphindzeke ngetulu kwalokubili, kusuka kutinkhulungwane letinge-300 kuya ngetulu kwetinkhulungwane letinge-700 emkhatsini wa-2003 na-2011.

sot: ho kutla tikoloho e ntle e loketseng ho ithuta, re ahile dikolo tse ntjha tse 370 re fedisa dikolo tse ahilweng ka mobu le meaho e meng e boemong bo bobe naha ka bophara.
ssw: luhlakamsebenti lwenchubomgomo lemayelana nekufinyelela libanga r kwawo wonkhe umntfwana selufakwe kugazethi kute ummango wente tiphakamiso ngalo, ngenhloso yekwenta kutsi kuphoceleleke kufundza libanga r. bantfu bakitsi,bantfwana labatigidzi letisiphohlongo abakhokhi esikolweni, kantsi labatigidzi letiyimfica batfola kudla lokunemphilo esikolweni lokuphuma kuhulumende, kute bafundze kahle bangabulawa yindlala.

sot: boingodiso ba baithuti bo eketsehile ka 12% diyunivesithing, ha boingodiso ba dikholetjhe tsa thuto le thupelo e tswellang (fet) bo eketsehile ka 90%.
ssw: silinganisonani sekuphasa kwebafundzi bamatikuletjeni sikhuphukile sisuka lapha ema-60% saya ema-78% kulomnyaka lophelile futsi nekuphumelela ngelizinga le-bachelor kuba ncono njalo ngemnyaka.

sot: re ekeditse dibajete tsa sekema sa naha sa thuso ya ditjhelete ha baithuti ho ya ho r9 bilione ho arabela ditlhokehong tse ntseng di eketseha.
ssw: ngekusebentisa luhlolo lwavelonkhe lwemnyaka, silandzelela tintfo letentiwe taba ncono kanye nekungenelela lokudzingekako, ikakhulu, etibalweni nakusayensi.

sot: katleho e nngwe e kgolo ya sehla sena e bile ho thewa ha diyunivesithi tse ntjha tse pedi, sol plaatjie e kapa leboya le yunivesithi ya mpumalanga.
ssw: kute sikhutsate kuhlanganisa ndzawonye konkhe kanye nekwehlukahlukana, ikharikhulamu yelulwimi lwetimphawu lwaseningizimu afrika itawufundziswa etikolweni kulomnyaka lotako, 2015. sesilikhulisile linani letfu lebantfu labadzala labakwati kufundza nekubhala ngekusebentisa luhlelo i-kha ri gude lisuke kutigidzi leti-2,2 nga-2008 laya kubantfu labatigidzi letintsatfu.

sot: re tla boela re aha dikholetjhe tsa fet tse 12 tse ntjha limpopo, mpumalanga, kwazulu-natal le kapa botjhabela.
ssw: siphindze futsi satjala imali ekucecesheni bothishela futsi sivula kabusha emakolishi ekucecesha bothishela kute sihlangabetane nalesidzingo.

sot: baheso,ho thakgolwa ha moralo wa naha wa setlamo sa thuto ngwahola e ne e le tswelopele ya bohlokwa ya naha ya rona.
ssw: kute sinikete simo lesikahle sekufundza, sesetfule tikolwa letinsha letinge-370 tangena esikhundleni setikolwa letakhiwe ngeludzaka naletinye takhiwo letingafanele kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi.

sot: motsamaisi wa dipuisano ya hlomphehangmodulasetulo wa ncop ya hlomphehangkatleho ho tsa hiv le aids ke e nngwe ya dikatleho tse kgolohadi tsa botsamaisi bona mme re sebediswa jwaloka naha eo e leng mohlala ke mananeo a aids a matjhaba a kopaneng, (unaids).
ssw: sikhulise luphakelomali lwesikhwama savelonkhe sekusita bafundzi ngemali ngetigidzigidzi letiyimfica temarandi kute sihlangabetane nesidzingo lesikhulako.

sot: phetisetso ya hiv ho tloha ho mme ho ya ngwaneng e theohile haholo mme re phetaphetile lenane la batho ba fumanang meriana ya antiretrovaerale, ho tloha bathong ba milione e le nngwe ho ya ho ba dimilione tse 2.4 ka 2013. maaforika borwa a fetang dimilione tse 20 a entse diteko tsa hiv haesale ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo ka 2011, e leng sesupo sa boitshepo tsamaisong ya bophelo bo botle.
ssw: lokunye lokukhulu lokuzuziwe kulethemu kusungulwa kwemayunivesithi lamabili lamasha sha, isol plaatje enyakatfo kapa kanye neyunivesithi yasempumalanga.

sot: re ananela seabo sa lekgotla la naha la aids la aforika borwa ka mosebetsi o boima oo le o etsang.
ssw: sifisela lelitsimba lokuhle emsebentini walo wavelonkhe.

sot: ha re ntse re keteka katleho ya rona, ha re a tshwanela ho qhanolla.
ssw: bantfu bakitsi,kunyenti lokuhle lesikwentile lesingakhuluma ngako ekwentiweni ncono kwetekunakekelwa ngetemphilo.

sot: ka bobatsi, re tla kena mokgahlelong o motjha ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha lenaneo la inshorense ya naha ya bophelo bo botle.
ssw: somlomo lohloniphekilesihlalo lohloniphekile wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhekwehla kwelizinga lekubhebhetseka kwesandvulelangculazi nengculazi ngulokunye lokukhulu kakhulu lokuzuziwe kulohulumende futsi sisetjentiswa njengelive lelisibonelo setinhlelo letibukene nengculazi tamhlabuhlangene.

sot: modulasetulo wa ncop ya hlomphehang,motsamaisi wa dipuisano ya hlomphehangsekgahla sa ditlolo tsa molao ka kakaretso se fokotsehile ka 21% haesale ho tloha ka 2002 mme mosebetsi wa ho etsa hore dibaka di bolokehe o ntse o tswela pele.
ssw: kwendluliselwa kweligciwane sandvulelangculazi lisuke kumake liye kumntfwana kwehle kakhulu kantsi linani lebantfu labelashwa ngetidzambisigciwane seliphindzeke kabili, kusuka kubantfu labatigidzi leti-2,4 nga-2013.

sot: e nngwe ya dintho tseo re tsepamisitseng maikutlo ho tsona ke ho fediswa ha dikgoka kgahlanong le basadi le bana.
ssw: bantfu labangetulu kwetigidzi letinge-20 baseningizimu afrika sebatihlolile simo sabo mayelana naleligciwane kusukela kwetfulwa lomkhankhaso nga-2011 lokukhombisa kwetsemba inchubo yetemphilo.

sot: re leboha mekgatlo e mengata eo e seng ya mmuso e phahamisang ditokelo tsa basadi le tsa bana, e bileng le seabo se setle mosebetsing ona wa bohlokwa.
ssw: sibonga ligalelo lelifakwe ngumkhandlu lobukene netengculazi wavelonkhe waseningizimu afrika ngemsebenti lomatima lowentile.

sot: naha ya rona e ntse e tswela pele ho ba phofu ya batlatlapi ba ditshukudu.
ssw: lapho sigubha imphumelelo yetfu, asingabi ngulabanetisekako.

sot: dieijensi tsa rona tsa qobello ya molao di sebetsa ka thata ho fedisa sewa sena.
ssw: umsebenti wekutivikela ufanele kutsi uchubeke kute kutsi sifike masinyane kulomgomo kubete bantfu labangenwa sandvulelangculazi.

sot: re se re entse ditumellano le china, vietnam, kenya, mozambique le dinaha tse ding tsa dinaha tse tswelang pele tsa aforika e ka borwa (sadc) ho sebedisana mmoho ho fedisa ditlolo tsena tsa molao.
ssw: ngalokubanti, sitawungena esigabeni lesisha sekuphumelelisa luhlelo lwemshwalensi wetemphilo lwavelonkhe lolutakwenweba lizinga lelifanele letekunakekelwa ngetemphilo kubantfu labaphuyile.

sot: re leboha ba kgwebo le maaforika borwa ohle a bileng le seabo letsholong la ho boloka ditshukudu.
ssw: sihlalo lohloniphekile we-ncop,somlomo lohloniphekilesilinganisonani sesiphelele sehle ngema-21% kusukela nga-2002 futsi umsebenti usachubeka kute kwentiwe imimango ibe ngulephephile.

sot: bahesoboikemelo ba boahlodi bo boetse ba ntlafatswa ka ho thewa ha kantoro ya moahlodi e moholo e le setheo se kathoko ho lefapha la toka le ntshetsopele ya molaotheo.
ssw: lokunye kwetintfo letibaluleke kakhulu lokugcilwe kuto kucedza budlova lobentiwa kubomake nakubatfwana.

sot: re se re ananetse melao e mengatanyana ya ho tshehetsa seabo sena se setjha sa kantoro ya moahlodi e moholo.
ssw: tinyenti tintfo letetfuliwe kute kubukanwe nalenselele.

sot: kgatelopele e ntse e etswa phetohong ya boahlodi hore bo bontshe palo e nepahetseng ya setjhaba mabapi le merabe le bong naheng ya rona.
ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kuvula kabusha timphiko letibukene nemacala ebudlova basemakhaya, kuvikelwa kwebantfwana nemacala etemancansi.

sot: leha ho le jwalo, boemedi bo fokolang haholo ba basadi ditulong tsa boahlodi e dula e ntse e ngongorehisa.
ssw: live letfu lichubeka sizindza salabo labatingela bobhejane.

sot: phephetso ke ho fetola porofeshene ya tsa molao ka bobatsi ka sepheo sa ho nontsha sehlopha seo baahlodi ba basadi ba ka thonngwang ho tloha ho sona.
ssw: tikhungo tetfu leticinisekisa kulandzelwa kwemtsetfo tisebenta ngekutikhandla kute ticedze lesihlava.

sot: ho phethelwa ha sekamolao sa ho sebetsa ka tsa molao ho tla thusa ho atolla sesiu seo bahlanka ba tshwanelehileng ba tsa boahlodi ba ka kgethwang ho tswa ho sona.. motsamaisi wa dipuisano ya hlomphehang le modulasetulo,maaforika borwa a kopane ka ho labalabela setjhaba se hlokang bonyofonyofo.
ssw: sphindze futsi senta sivumelwano neshayina, ivietnam, ikenya, imozambique kanye nalamanye mave latfutfukakoase-afrika leseningizimu kutsi sisebentisane kute simise lobugebengu.

sot: twantsho ya bonyofonyofo kahare ho tshebeletso ya setjhaba ho bea ditholwana tse ntlehaesale ho tloha ha khomishene ya tshebeletso ya setjhaba e ne e thakgola mohala wa naha wa mahala wa ho tlaleha diketso tsa bonyofonyofo, ditlaleho tse fetang 13 000 tsa bonyofonyofo le botsamaisi bo soro di se di fetiseditswe mafapheng a mmuso bakeng sa tshekatsheko le dipatlisiso tse tomanyana.
ssw: sibonga ummango wetemabhizinisi waseningizimu afrika nabo bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika labahlanganyela kulomkhankhaso wekusindzisa bobhejane.

sot: mmuso o se o kgutlisitse tjhelete e fetang r320 milione ho tswa ho balotsana bao ka thuso ya mohala wa naha wa mahala wa ho tlaleha diketso tsa bonyofonyofo.
ssw: bantfu bakitsikutimela kwebetebulungswa sekuchubeke kwentiwa ncono ngekutsi kusungulwe lihhovisi lelijaji lelikhulu njengesikhungo lesehlukile kulitiko letebulungiswa nekutfutfukiswa kwemtsetfosisekelo.

sot: tse ding tsa dikatleho tsa mohala wa naha wa mahala wa ho tlaleha diketso tsa bonyofonyofo di akga tse latelang:ho thibela bonyofonyofo tsamaisong ya ho rekwa le ho rekiswa ha dintho, mmuso o qetile ka ho thea boto e le nngwe e sebetsanang le dithendara feela ho aba dithendara makaleng ohle a mmuso.
ssw: sesikhiphe imitsetfo leminyenti leyesekela lendzima lensha ledlalwa lihhovis lelijaji lelikhulu.

sot: lekgotla lena le tla sebetsa le mohlanka e moholo wa phumantsho eo mosebetsi wa hae o ka sehloohong e tla ba ho hlahloba sekepele sa ditheko le tsitlallelo ho mekgwatsamaiso esita le tlhokeho ya leeme.
ssw: kunenchubekelembili ekuguculeni tebulungiswa kute tikhombise buhlanga nebulili bebantfu balelive lakitsi.

sot: yuniti e ikgethileng ya dipatlisiso e batlisisa ka botsamaisi bo soro kapa dipelaelo tsa bonyofonyofo mafapheng a mangatanyana a mmuso le ditheong tsa mmuso, ka dikgoeletso tse 40 tse tekennweng ke moporesidente nakong ya botsamaisi bona.
ssw: lijaji lelikhulu laseriphabhulikhi yaseningizimu afrika liyachubeka nekuba nekuhlahla kanye nekuhola lengucuko.

sot: ngwahola, ba ikarabellang ho tsa ditlhodisano ba fupuditse ho nyollwa ho seng molaong ha ditheko indastering ya kaho mme ba ahlola dikhamphane tse molato r1.4 bilione.
ssw: inselele lekhona kugucula bungcweti betemtsetfo ngalokubanti kute kutewukhuliswa umtfombo emajaji labomake langakhetfwa kuwo.

sot: dikgato tse ding tse kgahlanong le bao ba amehang di se di le motjheng.
ssw: kuphotfulwa kwemtsetfosivivinyo weligunya lekusebenta kutemtsetfo utawusita ekukhuliseni umtfombo lekungakhetfwa kuwo labo labangaba ngemajaji.

sot: baheso,jwale ke lakatsa ho ama ka bokgutshwane tsa phano ya ditshebeletso tsa mantlha bathong ba habo rona.
ssw: somlomo nasihlalo labahloniphekile,bantfu baseningizimu afrika babumbene ekufuneni ummango lote inkhohlakalo.

sot: dilemong tse 20 tse fetileng, ho entswe dikatleho tse babatsehang keketsehong ya phihlello ditshebeletsong tse kang metsi, tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere le motlakase.
ssw: kulwa nenkhohlakalo kutemisebenti yahulumende kukhicta imphumela.

sot: mmuso o se o qadile ka mosebetsi o matla wa ho fedisa matlwana a mabakethe e le karolo ya ho kgutlisa seriti sa batho ba rona.
ssw: kusukela kwetfulwa lucingo lwavelonkhe lwamahhala lwekubika inkhohlakalalo yikhomshini yetemisebenti yahulumende, angetulu kwala-13 000 emacala enkhohlakalo nekungaphatsi ngendlela lefanele sekwendluliselwe kumatiko ahulumende kute kubuketwe ngalokuchubekako futsi kuphenywe.

sot: ho tsa matlo, diyuniti tse ka bang dimlione tse tharo tsa matlo le ditsha tse nang le ditshebeletso tse fetang 855 000 di filwe batho haesale ho tloha ka 1994. dibaka tsa baipehi tse ka bang 500 di heleditswe mme ha ahwa matlo a boleng a nang le ditshebeletso tsa mantlha dilemong tse hlano tse fetileng.
ssw: hulumende sewutfole ngetulu kwemarandi latigidzi letinge-320 kubenti bebubi ngekusebentisa lucingo lwavelonkhe lwamahhala lwekubika inkhohlakalo.

sot: botsamaisi bo latelang bo tla kgothaletsa diprojeke tsa matlo tse dibakeng tse betere bakeng sa ba amohelang meputso e fapafapaneng.
ssw: letinye timphumelelo telucingo lwavelonkhe lwamahhala lwekubika inkhohlakalo tifaka ekhatsi naku lokulandzelako:mayelana nekuvikela inkhohlakalo kunchubo yekuniketa tinsita, hulumende uncume kusungula ibhodi yemathenda letawuncuma ngekukhishwa kwemathenda kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende.

sot: baheso,dibaka tse ding di sa ntse di se na ditshebeletso tsena, haholoholo dibaka tsa baipehi le tsa mahaeng.
ssw: lomtimba utawusebenta kanye nesikhulu lesisetulu lesibukene nekutfolwa kwemisebenti noma tinsita kantsi umsebenti waso lomkhlu kutawuba kuhlola tintsengo nekuhambisa tindlelanchubo kanye nekwenta ngendlela lefanele.
